TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit RegistryPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class RegistryPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class RegistryPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission
type RegistryPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: Controls the ability to access registry variables.

span.span: Controls the ability to access registry variables.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介绍对注册表变量的受保护的操作。 describes protected operations on registry variables. 不应将注册表变量存储在某些内存位置，在这些位置，不具有 的代码可访问这些变量。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 如果该注册表对象传递给不受信任调用方可能会被误用。If the registry object is passed to an untrusted caller it can be misused. 允许的注册表访问类型由定义。The allowed registry access types are defined by . 如果需要多个类型的访问权限，则它们可以组合使用位或运算，如下面的代码示例中所示。If more than one type of access is desired, they can be combined using the bitwise OR operation as shown in the code sample that follows. 根据规范的绝对路径; 定义注册表权限始终应使用规范路径名进行检查。Registry permission is defined in terms of canonical absolute paths; checks should always be made with canonical pathnames. 密钥访问权限意味着可以对它包含的所有值和其下的所有变量的访问。Key access implies access to all values it contains and all variables under it. > [!NOTE] > 在之前的.NET framework 版本[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，可以使用方法，以防止对系统资源的意外访问受信任的代码。In versions of the .NET Framework before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], you could use the method to prevent inadvertent access to system resources by trusted code. 现已过时，并对资源的访问现在只能由授予的权限集的程序集来决定。 is now obsolete, and access to resources is now determined solely by the granted permission set for an assembly. 若要限制访问文件，必须运行沙盒中部分受信任的代码，并将它分配给代码可以访问的资源的权限。To limit access to files, you must run partially trusted code in a sandbox and assign it permissions only to resources that the code is allowed to access. 有关在沙盒中运行的应用程序的信息，请参阅[如何： 运行部分受信任的代码在沙盒中](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md)。For information about running an application in a sandbox, see [How to: Run Partially Trusted Code in a Sandbox](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数仅允许的一个指定值。This constructor allows only one of the values to be specified. 此访问权限适用于所有列出的注册表变量。This access applies to all listed registry variables. 使用定义更复杂的权限。Use to define more complicated permissions. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数。The following code example shows the use of the constructor. summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified access to the specified registry variables and the specified access rights to registry control information.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified access to the specified registry variables and the specified access rights to registry control information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数仅允许的一个指定值。This constructor allows only one of the values to be specified. 此访问权限适用于所有列出的注册表变量。This access applies to all listed registry variables. 使用定义更复杂的权限。Use to define more complicated permissions. `control`参数指定的访问控制列表 (ACL) 为指定的注册表项是否`pathList`可以更改、 查看或无法访问。The `control` parameter specifies whether the access control list (ACL) for the registry keys specified by `pathList` can be changed, viewed, or cannot be accessed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 个人或组，或没有执行对指定的注册表项的特定操作的权限的人员，介绍了访问控制列表 (ACL)。An access control list (ACL) describes individuals or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the specified registry keys. 能够更改或查看 ACL 是一种重要权限，并应授予谨慎使用。The ability to change or view an ACL is an important permission and should be granted with caution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法通过将其路径的集添加到当前权限对象的状态修改对注册表变量的访问。Use this method to modify access to registry variables by adding the set of their paths to the state of the current permission object. 此重载允许您指定的访问控制操作，如将作为注册表权限访问。This overload allows you to specify the access control action as will as the registry permission access. `control`参数指定的访问控制列表 (ACL) 为指定的注册表项是否`pathList`可以更改、 查看或无法访问。The `control` parameter specifies whether the access control list (ACL) for the registry keys specified by `pathList` can be changed, viewed, or cannot be accessed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 个人或组，或没有执行对指定的注册表项的特定操作的权限的人员，介绍了访问控制列表 (ACL)。An access control list (ACL) describes individuals or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the specified registry keys. 能够更改或查看 ACL 是一种重要权限，并应授予谨慎使用。The ability to change or view an ACL is an important permission and should be granted with caution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个权限的交集是描述两者共同描述的操作组的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有传递两个原始权限的请求将通过该交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed

param.name: target
param.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前权限指定一组操作完全包含指定的权限，则当前权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，表示对 C:\example.txt 访问权限的权限是到 c： 表示访问权限的子集\\。For example, a permission that represents access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\. 如果此方法返回`true`，当前权限表示对受保护资源的访问权限不超过指定的权限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission.

exception.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

span.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无限制的权限表示对受权限保护的所有资源的访问权限。An unrestricted permission represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对的调用结果是当前权限和指定的权限表示所表示的所有操作的权限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 任何请求都会通过任一权限传递其联合。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.
